feed.title: [BIP Proposal] Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction (PSBT) format

entry.title: [BIP Proposal] Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction (PSBT) format
entry.summary: In an email to the bitcoin-dev mailing list, Andrew Chow has proposed a standard format for unsigned and partially signed transactions. However, another member of the mailing list, Bryan, suggested that a thread on hardware wallet BIP drafting may be tangentially related and useful. The link to this thread is provided in the email.
